Title: Message Received
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle, Patti LuPone
Plot: Peridot double-crosses the Crystal Gems when she activates a direct line Communicator to contact Yellow Diamond.
